info.title: Building Type Analysis
info.description: Not sure? Narrow down whether your project falls under the specifications of a single- or a multi-unit dwelling.

P01.questionText: Check all that apply to this proposed building project:

possibleAnswers.answerDisplayText: Will involve construction of a new <defined-term>building</defined-term>.

Will be a multi-dwelling unit building with no other <defined-term override-term='major occupancy'>major occupancies</defined-term> or <defined-term override-term='secondary suite'>secondary suites</defined-term>.

possibleInvalidAnswers.errorMessage: 'None of the above' cannot be selected at the same time as other answers

P02.questionText: This project will meet all of the following requirements:
P02.questionSubtext:
• The building area of this building is not greater than 600 m2
  • The storeys in building height will be less than 4.

R00.resultDisplayMessage: Based on your selection, this proposed building project is not a new single dwelling unit, or a new multi-dwelling unit building and at this time this tool is only designed to assist users to determine conformance with the requirements of the BC Building Code 2024 for single dwelling units and multi-dwelling unit buildings, as such this tool is not applicable to your proposed building project.

R01.resultDisplayMessage: Based on your selection this proposed building project is a new single dwelling unit. Click Continue to view the associated walkthroughs.

R02.resultDisplayMessage: Based on your selection this proposed building project is a new multi-dwelling unit building. Click Continue to build your walkthrough.

R03.resultDisplayMessage: Based on your selection this proposed building project exceeds the maximum building area and/or building height limits for a Part 9 building. If the building is more than 600 m2 in building area and/or 3 storeys in building height, this building project will be required to be designed in accordance with Parts 3, 4, 5, and 6 of the BC Building Code 2024 and at this time this tool is only designed to assist users to determine conformance with requirements of the BC Building Code 2024 Part 9, please contact the appropriate required design professionals for this proposed building project.
